job.title: Network System Engineer
job.description: We are hiring a System Network Engineer for a MSP Company to start immediately. This is an on site, contract to hire position. (NO C2C or Sponsorship)You will be providing both remote and on site support in regards to any System and Network issues for the customers.Â We are looking for someone who is: (Required experiences)Â Experienced in setting up and provisioning VMWare 6 & 7Â Supporting Layer 3 switchesÂ Bachelor Degree or related certificates such as CCNA, MCSE, etc.Â Solid network and MS skills including cloud, understanding of cyber security, SonicWALL or solid firewall experienceAbility to support large scale WIFIÂ Project Management experienceÂ A Valid Drivers' license as you need to drive to clients' sites when neededÂ Excellent interpersonal communication skillsÂ A criminal background check will be conductedÂ
